poem:
A Call to Action

Words shatter  
like glass in November,  
shards of hope  
beneath the chatter—  
Gaza craves  
more than sighs;  
actions speak  
where silence  
lays heavy.  
In the rubble,  
echoes drum—  
not just  
letters  
on a page,  
but the rhythm  
of resolve  
that stirs  
the waking world.
